thread.title: Vatican says Pope Francis' condition still 'critical'
thread.title_full: Vatican says Pope Francis' condition still 'critical'

author: ABC News
title: Vatican says Pope Francis' condition still 'critical'
text:
Vatican says Pope Francis’ condition still 'critical’
The Vatican said Pope Francis' health remained "critical" on Sunday, but he hasn't experienced any more "respiratory crises" since Saturday evening.
February 23, 2025
